mapper.select: SELECT store_no ,store_name ,store_address_road ,store_address_detail ,store_latitude ,store_longitude ,store_phone_no ,store_charge_week ,store_charge_weekend FROM store ORDER BY store_no ASC

SELECT store_no ,store_name ,store_address_road ,store_address_detail ,store_latitude ,store_longitude ,store_phone_no ,store_charge_week ,store_charge_weekend FROM store
where store_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT s.store_no ,store_name ,store_address_road ,store_address_detail ,store_latitude ,store_longitude ,store_phone_no ,store_charge_week ,store_charge_weekend FROM store s ,owned_game o WHERE s.store_no = o.store_no AND o.game_no = #{gameNo}

select mg.user_no as userNo, u.user_nickname as userNickname, u.user_path_profile as userPathProfile, u.user_gender as userGender from matching_group mg, users u where mg.user_no = u.user_no and mg.matching_no = #{matchingno}

select store_description as storeDesc, store_name as storeName, store_phone_no as storePhoneNo, store_charge_week as storeChargeWeek, store_charge_weekend as storeChargeWeekend, store_address_road as storeAddressRoad, store_address_detail as storeAddressDetail from store where store_no = #{storeNo}

select reservation_date_no as reservationDateNo, store_reservation_time as storeReservationTime from reservation_time where reservation_date_no = #{reservationDateNo} order by store_reservation_time asc

SELECT og.game_no, g.game_name_ko, g.game_path_thumbnail, g.game_people, g.game_age, g.game_time, g.game_difficulty FROM owned_game og LEFT OUTER JOIN game g ON og.game_no = g.game_no WHERE store_no = #{ storeNo }
